title: F/S T206 Barney Pelty Horizontal PSA 5's + Others
author: bbsports

posts.post_title: F/S T206 Barney Pelty Horizontal PSA 5's + Others
posts.post_content: Selling Barney Pelty, short print PSA 5 Sweet Cap 150, last Heritage auction card sold for $2K. Looking for $1500. I also have a Sovereign 150 PSA 5. the only graded 5 in the PSA registry $2800.  Other cards I have available : Tim Jordan Batting P 350, PSA 5.5 $425., Harry McIntyre Brooklyn & Chicago, SC 350, PSA 5 $185., Del Howard, Chicago, SC 350, PSA 5 $275, Bescher, Hands in Air PSA 5 $185., Bill Abstein P 350, PSA 5 $225., and Jap Barbeau, P350 PSA 5 $225.     For phone scans, text me at 973-809-5770  Thank you.
Email/text sent about McIntyre and Bescher.  :)
I'll take the McIntyre and Bescher.  Thanks!!  :)

The T206 Del Howard, Harry McIntyre, and Bob Bescher PSA 5 cards have been SOLD. Both Barney Pelty horizontal cards are still available. Price drop on Tim Jordan batting PSA 5,5 $325., Jap Barbeau, and Bill Abstein are $200. each. Added 3 more PSA 5's: Lou Fiene Portrait $225, Jimmy Dygert and Lena Blackburne $185. each. 
                For phone scans, text me at 973-809-5770. Thank you.
I'll take all three new ones.  Text message sent to request scans.  :)
